勿cue.definition: (Internet slang) don't call on me; don't drag me in

勿忘國恥.definition: Never forget national humiliation, refers to Mukden railway incident of 18th September 1931 九一八事變|九一八事变 and subsequent Japanese annexation of Manchuria

勿謂言之不預.pinyin: wù wèi yán zhī bù yù
勿謂言之不預.definition: (idiom) don't say you haven't been forewarned (threat used by the PRC in international diplomacy)
